criterion: Provides a structured outline for the hospital grand rounds on sepsis management
Includes a clear reference to the Surviving Sepsis guidelines and relevant clinical trials
Uses advanced pathophysiological explanations for sepsis management
Provides teaching points and controversies for each section of the presentation
Asks for further clarification or details about the user's query
Mentions the importance of early recognition and prompt fluid resuscitation in sepsis management
Incorrectly states that hemodynamic support is not necessary in sepsis management
Lacks clear instructions on how to adapt the provided outline for slides
Fails to mention the role of lactate clearance in sepsis management
Provides overly complex medical information that may confuse the audience
Lacks a clear conclusion or summary for the presentation
